participant_1.name: Zach
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic about music and gaming.
participant_1.background: I listen to metal music. I wear a lot of leather. I have boots I always wear. I have black spiky hair.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Creative and playful, with a passion for vibrant colors and gaming.
participant_2.background: My favorite color is red. I have purple hair. My favorite movie is Gone with the Wind. I like to play video games. I have 2 turtles.

content.text: I'm a big fan of metal music, so I love your hair!
Thanks! I'm a big fan of purple hair, so I love yours too!
I'm also a big fan of video games, so I'm guessing you're into that too?
Yeah, I love video games! What's your favorite game?
I'm a big fan of the Legend of Zelda series.
Oh, I love Zelda too! I'm currently playing Breath of the Wild.
I've heard great things about that game. I'm definitely going to have to check it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
What other games do you like to play?
I also like to play Mario games, Pokemon games, and Minecraft.
I like Mario games too! I've never been a big fan of Pokemon, but I've heard good things about it.
You should give Pokemon a try! It's a lot of fun.
I'll have to do that. I've also never played Minecraft.
You should definitely check it out! It's a really fun game.
I'll have to add it to my list.
